name: BusinessMan
description: In BusinessMan, you are an entrepreneur among others. You can for example start off by investing your initial 20kâ‚¬ smartly or try to become a chairman in some company. Once you're a chairman, you start making regular income, but the biggest incomes naturally lie behind the greatest of risks.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer (64-bit) Processor: +2.7GHz proseccor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer (64-bit) Processor: Intel Skylake i5-6600K 3.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950  or AMD equivalent Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
